hero.title: Your Business Universe in Your Pocket
hero.description: Harness the power of Kozmos to transform your mobile device into your business command center, anywhere in the world.

mobile.heroTitle: Unleash Your Business Potential, Anywhere, Anytime
mobile.heroDescription: Transform your mobile device into a powerful business command center. The Wix app puts your entire operation at your fingertips, empowering you to build, manage, and grow without boundaries.

section1.title: Your Website's Command Center in Your Pocket
section1.description: Experience the freedom of managing your digital presence from anywhere. With powerful mobile tools at your disposal, your website becomes a dynamic asset that evolves with your visionâ€”no desk required.
features: Access comprehensive dashboard controls to fine-tune your website on the move
Craft compelling social media content that amplifies your brand's voice and reach
Orchestrate targeted email campaigns that transform casual visitors into loyal customers

section2.title: Cultivate Meaningful Customer Connections, Instantly
section2.description: In today's rapid business landscape, responsiveness is everything. Transform fleeting interactions into lasting relationships with communication tools designed for the modern entrepreneur.
features: Engage in seamless conversations with customers through intuitive live chat functionality
Orchestrate your communications with an intelligent inbox that prioritizes what matters most
Build customer loyalty through consistent, thoughtful engagement that resonates

section3.title: Illuminate Your Business Performance with Real-Time Insights
section3.description: Data becomes your strategic advantage when it's accessible anywhere. Gain crystal-clear visibility into your business operations with powerful mobile analytics that reveal opportunities others might miss.
features: Monitor vital business metrics through an intuitive dashboard that tells your success story at a glance
Decode visitor journeys and conversion patterns to refine your customer experience strategy
Generate comprehensive performance reports with a few simple taps, perfect for meetings on the go

section4.title: Seamless Order Fulfillment from Palm to Doorstep
section4.description: Transform your supply chain into a competitive advantage with mobile inventory management that ensures you're always one step ahead. Keep your promises to customers with precision that builds trust and loyalty.
features: Orchestrate your entire fulfillment process with the tap of a finger, no matter where you are
Stay informed with instant alerts that keep you connected to your business's pulse
Provide customers with transparency through real-time shipping updates they can trust

section5.title: Orchestrate Your Schedule with Elegant Precision
section5.description: Time is your most precious resource. Our mobile scheduling system transforms chaotic calendars into harmonious symphonies of productivity, helping you maximize every moment while delighting your clients.
features: Take command of your professional schedule with intuitive calendar management that adapts to your rhythm
Eliminate costly no-shows with automated reminders that respect both your time and your clients'
Empower clients with self-service booking that feels personal and attentive

section6.title: Cultivate a Thriving Digital Community
section6.description: In the digital age, community is currency. Build a vibrant ecosystem around your brand that fosters loyalty, sparks conversation, and creates advocates who amplify your message organically.
features: Design and nurture membership experiences that transform casual customers into brand ambassadors
Foster genuine connections through moderated discussions that build community cohesion
Craft exclusive content journeys that reward your most dedicated followers

section7.title: Frictionless Financial Transactions, Anywhere
section7.description: Convert opportunities into revenue without missing a beat. Our mobile payment solutions eliminate geographical boundaries, allowing you to close deals with professional finesse whether you're in the office or across the globe.
features: Transform your mobile device into a sophisticated point-of-sale system that inspires customer confidence
Create polished financial documentation instantly, elevating your brand's professional image
Gain profound visibility into your financial ecosystem with detailed analytics that inform strategic decisions

whatIs.title: What is an AI Agent?
whatIs.subtitle: AI agents are intelligent software systems that can independently perform complex tasks, learn from your data, and automate your operations.
whatIs.point1: AI agents are advanced software solutions that enhance your business efficiency using natural language processing, machine learning, and artificial intelligence technologies.
whatIs.point2: They seamlessly integrate with your existing systems, interacting with your databases and workflows to make real-time decisions.
whatIs.point3: They can automate tasks across various areas including customer service, sales, marketing, and operational processes.
whatIs.point4: They learn and adapt to your business's unique needs over time, providing continuously improving performance and results.

howWorks.title: How Do AI Agents Work?
howWorks.subtitle: Discover the power of our AI agents and how they transform your workflow.

step1.title: Memory
step1.description: The agent is equipped in general with short term, long term, consensus, and episodic memory. Short term memory for immediate interactions, long-term memory for historical data and conversations, episodic memory for past interactions, and consensus memory for shared information among agents. The agent can maintain context, learn from experiences, and improve performance by recalling past interactions and adapting to new situations.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Tools are functions or external resources that an agent can utilize to interact with its environment and enhance its capabilities. They allow agents to perform complex tasks by accessing information, manipulating data, or controlling external systems, and can be categorized based on their user interface, including physical, graphical, and program-based interfaces. Tool learning involves teaching agents how to effectively use these tools by understanding their functionalities and the context in which they should be applied.

step3.title: Model
step3.description: They automate repetitive tasks and support decision-making, increasing efficiency.

persona.title: Persona
persona.description: A well defined persona allows an agent to maintain a consistent character and behave in a manner appropriate to its assigned role, evolving as the agent gains experience and interacts with its environment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About AI Agents
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our AI agents and how they can transform your workflow.

left.q1: What languages do your AI agents support?
left.a1: Our AI agents support multiple languages including English, Turkish, German, French, Spanish, and many more. Multi-language support makes it easy to serve your global customers.
left.q2: Do I need technical knowledge to use your AI agents?
left.a2: No, our user-friendly interface means technical knowledge is not required. Our technical team will support you during the setup and integration processes.
left.q3: How do your AI agents protect sensitive data?
left.a3: We implement the highest level of security protocols. All data is encrypted, stored on secure servers, and complies fully with regulations such as GDPR and local data protection laws.
left.q4: Can your agents learn over time?
left.a4: Yes, our AI agents use machine learning technology to learn and adapt over time. They become increasingly intelligent based on your business's unique needs.
left.q5: Do you offer customized solutions for my company?
left.a5: Absolutely. We customize our AI agents to meet each business's unique needs. Our expert team works closely with you to design the solution that best fits your requirements.

right.a1: We have various pricing plans for different business sizes and needs. You can contact our sales team for detailed information about our Basic, Professional, and Enterprise packages.
right.q2: How long does it take to set up your agents?
right.a2: Setup typically takes 2-4 weeks depending on integration complexity. With our quick-start packages, some solutions can be operational within days.
right.q3: In which industries can your AI agents be used?
right.a3: Our agents can be adapted to retail, finance, healthcare, education, manufacturing, and many other sectors. We offer specialized solutions for each industry.
right.a4: Yes, we provide 24/7 technical support to all our customers. We're always there for you in emergencies and resolve your issues quickly.
right.q5: Is there a trial option for your agents?
right.a5: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial period for potential customers. During this time, you can test all the features of our AI agents and see how they will benefit your business.

section1.title: User Experience and Interface
section1.content: Our mobile applications offer an intuitive navigation structure specially designed for user needs. Interfaces created in accordance with modern UI/UX principles provide both aesthetically pleasing and highly functional use. Thanks to menu structures developed by analyzing user habits, all features are easily accessible. Our interfaces, optimized for every screen size and resolution with a responsive design understanding, offer a consistent experience.

section2.title: Technical Infrastructure and Performance
section2.content: Our applications, developed using current technologies such as React Native, Flutter, and Swift, offer optimum performance by efficiently using device resources. Thanks to advanced optimization techniques running in the background, we offer high performance with low power consumption. Our applications maintain smooth performance even in intensive usage scenarios, while extending battery life by keeping background processes to a minimum. We continuously maintain this standard with periodic performance tests and updates.

section3.title: Customization and Security
section3.content: Thanks to the wide customization options we offer to our users, everyone can create an experience according to their preferences. We offer flexible configuration options in many areas such as theme colors, notification settings, and recommendations based on usage habits. In terms of security, our applications developed in accordance with OWASP standards have many layers of protection such as data encryption, two-factor authentication, and session management. We conduct regular security audits and updates to ensure the security of user data.

section4.title: Continuous Development and Support
section4.content: We continuously improve our applications in line with user feedback and technological developments. We add new features, make performance improvements, and close security vulnerabilities with the updates we release at regular intervals. Our live support team provides 24/7 service to quickly resolve issues encountered by our users. We also ensure that users get the maximum efficiency from our applications with comprehensive documentation and how-to guides.

section1.title: User Experience and Interface Design
section1.content: Our web applications are developed with user-centered design principles and provide an intuitive navigation experience. Interfaces designed in accordance with modern UI/UX standards provide high usability as well as aesthetic appearance. While providing a consistent experience on all devices with a responsive design approach, it has been developed in accordance with accessibility standards. User flows are optimized with detailed analyses, ensuring that operations can be completed with minimum clicks. Interface components are positioned taking into account user habits.

section2.title: Technological Infrastructure and Performance Optimization
section2.content: Our applications, developed using Next.js, React, and modern web technologies, offer high performance and scalability. While server-side rendering and static generation features provide fast loading times, resource usage is optimized with lazy loading techniques. CDN integration and caching mechanisms aim for low latency on a global scale. Continuous improvements are made based on performance metrics, while Lighthouse scores are regularly monitored. Database queries and API calls are optimized to minimize server load.

section3.title: Security and Data Management
section3.content: Our web applications are developed in accordance with OWASP Top 10 security standards. End-to-end encryption, CSRF protection, XSS measures, and other security layers are implemented in data transmission. While user authorizations are managed with role-based access control (RBAC), all inputs are validated. Possible vulnerabilities are detected in advance with regular security audits and penetration tests. GDPR and KVKK compliance ensures the security and privacy of user data. Data backup and disaster recovery procedures are automated.

section4.title: Continuous Integration and Development Process
section4.content: Our development process, managed with Agile methodology, aims to quickly reflect user feedback into the product. Thanks to CI/CD pipelines, we have the flexibility to make multiple production deployments per day. While the impact of new features is measured with A/B testing mechanisms, controlled roll-out strategies are implemented with feature flags. Application health and usage statistics are monitored in real-time, and performance anomalies are reported with automatic alarms. All APIs are standardized with documentation and a developer portal. Thanks to microservice architecture, system components can be scaled independently.

section1.title: Intelligent AI Agent Integration
section1.content: AI agents integrated into your applications take the user experience to next-generation levels. Our natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning-based agents instantly analyze user interactions to produce personalized responses. We automate complex workflows with our multi-agent systems and provide real-time decision support systems. Your agents continually learn from your data sources to improve themselves and bring intelligent optimizations to your business processes.

section2.title: Custom AI Models and Finetuning
section2.content: We develop fine-tuned AI models specific to your industry. By training your LLMs (Large Language Models) with your own data, we transfer your company's knowledge base to your digital assistants. We create smart chatbots with RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) architectures that provide real-time data access and avoid hallucinations. We transform your corporate knowledge management using custom embeddings and vector databases. We establish automatic retraining pipelines by continuously monitoring model performance.

section3.title: Autonomous Business Processes and Automation
section3.content: We make your routine business processes fully autonomous with our AI agents. We create digital employees that can make decisions on their own in areas such as document processing, data analysis, and customer service. We optimize human-AI collaboration with workflow automation and multiply your operational efficiency. While your agents seamlessly integrate with your existing systems through APIs, we provide advanced authorization mechanisms for secure data sharing.

section4.title: Real-Time Analysis and Predictions
section4.content: We extract meaningful predictions from your data with our AI-powered analytics platform. We support your proactive decision-making processes with anomaly detection, trend analysis, and forecasting models. With our multimodal AI approach, we analyze your text, audio, and image data together to provide a holistic perspective. We make complex data understandable with customizable dashboards and automatic reporting tools. Your agents instantly detect critical changes and send notifications to the relevant teams.

Step into the magic of colors now and breathe new life into your brand.

Thanks to our SEO-friendly structures, your potential customers can reach you exactly when they need you. Let's increase your visibility and grow your business!
